name: Independent! (INDP) - Game
description:
Independent is a free sandbox game single-player and online gameplay!
Using Unity3D and UnitZ , the game provides an good fun and you can play with your friends!
You can drive vehicles too haha ! =D

The game have events that gives to you the best guns or gives 2x,3x,4x or more I$(Game cash).

Now the game have Gun Unlocker Points(GUK)! You can unlock guns and buy them using I$! You can also equip the guns via inventory at main menu =D

GUK also have events =D

You also can try to get more powerful guns using Item Box! an aleatory 'box' that will give to you an item : The powerful gun or I$. You just need lucky to get the gun =D!

The game is 100% free.

You can call your friends to play with you or enter in a room by choosing an server!

The game have an special server for events : Events Server!

Different weapons to try!

You can get various weapons to try on game, including M4A1 and AK-47!

Every new update, a new gun is added to not to get in the mood of 'sameness'You can vote to add an new item on game too!

Link to poll

The game is in BETA version and every new update, the change log is posted at game ModDB page.

If you donate, new features can be added on game in a future!

Enjoy! =D
